name: Papa's BBQ
description: Halong Bay we want to create an international cuisine of course combined with Vietnamese cuisine. There is something to be found in this restaurant for all tastes. We do not cook fresh ingredients for so long, so that all good components of the products are maintained. We have Vegetarian Food.
address: Cong Vien Road C346 Sun World Area, Ha Long 200000 Vietnam

name: Avocado Restaurant
location_string: Bai Chay, Halong Bay, Quang Ninh Province
description: Fine-dining European & Vietnamese restaurant located in the very heart of Halong city's tourist area, next to the SunWorld Halong Complex and inside the city Old Street Zone walking street. We offer state-of-the-art Western and European cuisines and authentic Vietnamese foods. The restaurant is suitable for both individual travelers or groups and events. We offer food delivery and catering in the Halong City area and also feature cooking classes. We have an exclusive menu for vegeterians. With convenient location, nice seating, reasonable rating and excellent food quality and services, we believe that Avocado Restaurant would be a perfect choice for a fine-dining experience in Halong Bay area. Avocado is a plastic-free restaurant is a refill station for tourists to fill up their bottles with free drinking water. We encourage our clients and other tourists to reuse their bottles in order to reduce plastic waste in Halong city.
address: 9 Halong Road C342-343 Old Street Zone, Bai Chay, Halong Bay 200000 Vietnam

description: WANDER STATION is a restaurant and a relaxing place. We are specialized in making coffee from different countries style and also Cake. There's a broad of choice of traditional food and Western food that you can find here. Our staff is very friendly and always ready to help you. WE ARE HOPING TO SEE YOU SOON!

name: 1958 Restaurant
location_string: Tuan Chau Island, Halong Bay, Quang Ninh Province
description: Bringing Vietnamese traditions into the heart of the World Heritage Site. Named after the year that President Ho Chi Minh first visited Tuan Chau Island on September 13th, 1958, 1958 Restaurant is located few doors away from Paradise Suites Hotel, the first luxury boutique hotel in Halong Bay. The cozy and friendly setting at 1958 makes it the ideal choice for gatherings in the World Heritage Site. The restaurant serves authentic Vietnamese cuisine with signature dishes featuring fresh seafood prepared in traditional Vietnamese style from Northern Vietnam.
address: E19 - E20, Halong Bay, Tuan Chau Island Vietnam

name: Sandy Bay Beach Bar & Restaurant
location_string: Tuan Chau Island, Halong Bay, Quang Ninh Province

photo.caption: Nhà hàng & Bar Sandy Bay - Sandy Bay Restaurant & Bar

description: Sandy Bay is a beach bar & restaurant with a capacity of 600 stunning view seats. Our menu is composed by a good selection of Italian and international dishes as well as Vietnamese traditional dishes and in particular fresh seafood (avilable thanks to our fish thank that guests can see in front of one of the 2 entrances of Sandy Bay). Among the others, you could choose our delicious wood-fired oven pizzas, pastas, grilled steaks, burgers or healthy salads. Beverages include a selection of wines from France, Italy, New Zealand, Chile and Australia, beers, classic and special cocktails made by our experienced bartenders, fresh fruit juices made with the superb Vietnamese fruit, smoothies and spirits. BBQ menus, weekend buffets, and art shows.
address: Ngoc Chau Street, Halong Bay, Tuan Chau Island 200000 Vietnam

name: Rock House Pizza
description: We are serving American style Pizzas, Hamburgers, Steaks, Spaghetti, Fresh Salads,Waffles and Homemade Ice Cream. Our Pizza crusts and sauces are made fresh daily using local herbs and vegetables, cheese and meats are imported. Our hamburgers are made from selected imported beef and ground in our kitchen to assure a juicy, American style burger. Our steaks are cut in our kitchen and originate from imported beef. Our waffles and ice cream are "home-made" using our special recipe and imported ingredients. Rockhouse Pizza Pizza offers a comfortable non-smoking environment for persons, couples and families to enjoy good food and music.

name: Nha Hang Khai Huong

photo.caption: View hướng thẳng ra biển vịnh cửa lục

description: Welcome To Khai Huong Restaurant. ! Khai Huong Beer and Seafood Restaurant is the only restaurant near the coast of Ha Long, with a wide view overlooking Cua Luc Bay, the panoramic view of the majestic Bai Chay Bridge, the Queen's Cable Car, the international tourist ship port .. There is a prime location because the present-day restaurant campus is the old Hon Gai ferry port, built by Mr. and Mrs. Khai and Huong after the ferry stop. Why should you choose Khai Huong restaurant? - 2nd floor sitting outside table watching the whole of Ha Long Bay. - Motorbike parking, free car, accommodating up to 100 cars. - Fresh, varied seafood, cheap price (only from 5 usd -10 usd / person.) - Quick, enthusiastic, thoughtful service.
